jobDescription: Med / Surg (Oncology) - RN Registered NurseWhite Glove Placement, Inc is seeking Med / Surg – Oncology RN Registered Nurse for open positions at one of our client hospital. If you are an RN Registered Nurse with Med / Surg and/or Oncology experience then we would like to hear from YOU!Full Time Contract AssignmentsDay and Night shifts availableStart ASAPPositions available in the following units for Med / Surg Oncology RN Registered Nurses:GI/Gastric Mixed Tumor (Inpatient Oncology Unit)Leukemia/Lymphoma (Inpatient Oncology Unit)Head & Neck Oncology (Inpatient Oncology Unit)Working with White Glove as a Med / Surg Oncology Registered Nurse, you get excellent rates and benefits. Earn top salary, direct deposit (daily pay - at participating facilities), health benefits, Metro Cards and more!...and we have many more positions available for experienced nurses in addition to RN Registered Nurse for Med / Surg Oncology, including but not limited to, per diem, full-time, travel nursing, or local contract assignments.Requirements for RN Registered Nurse – Med / Surg Oncology PositionCurrent NYS Registered Nurse LicenseAt least 2 years solid Med / Surg experienceOncology experience preferredExperience with wounds and vents preferredBSN and OCN preferred.Our recruiters will take you through the rest of it, guiding you in the process to complete your file so you can start ASAP.
